title: Kebab seller image wins international food photo contest
description: A photo of a street food vendor has won Pink Lady Food Photographer of the Year 2022.

title: Match for Peace tour: 'I have friends in Ukraine with guns now'
description: Ukrainian players from Dynamo Kyiv and Borussia Dortmund speak about being away from loved ones.

title: The 'forgotten' rollercoaster disaster of Battersea funfair
description: In May 1972 five children were killed when the Big Dipper in Battersea Park crashed.

title: 'An hour a day built my million-pound side hustle'
description: Joel Remy-Parkes of kids tableware company Bamboo Bamboo shares his business advice for CEO Secrets.

title: Champions League: All-English final or Spain to reign in semi-finals?
description: BBC Sport looks at all the major narratives at play in the final four of the Champions League.

title: Ukraine war: Statue symbolic of Ukraine-Russia friendship destroyed
description: A statue that once represented friendship between the two countries is pulled down in Kyiv.

title: Ros Atkins on… Finland, Nato and Russia
description: Ros Atkins looks why Nato’s border with Russia looks likely to expand significantly.

title: Gaza farmer finds 4,500-year-old statue of Canaanite goddess
description: The stone head the Canaanite goddess of beauty, love and war is unearthed in a Khan Younis field.

title: Ukraine war to cause biggest price shock in 50 years - World Bank
description: Ukraine is pushing up prices of commodities including food, cotton and energy, the World Bank says.

title: Woman finds late husband's wedding ring after 35 years
description: Ann Kendrick, from Looe, Cornwall, said she never expected to see the ring again.

title: Nationality and Borders Bill: Can you lose your citizenship?
description: The Nationality and Borders Bill, currently being debated in Parliament, has sparked controversy.

title: Boris Johnson threatens to privatise Passport Office
description: Boris Johnson told ministers the service needed to start delivering better value for money.

title: Women's Six Nations: England captain Sarah Hunter to miss Grand Slam decider
description: England captain Sarah Hunter will miss Saturday's Grand Slam decider against France with a rib injury.

title: Bermondsey stabbings: Four killed in south-east London home named
description: Police say a 28-year-old man arrested over the deaths remains in a stable condition in hospital.

title: David Oluwale: Blue bridge plaque theft treated as hate crime
description: A sign for David Oluwale, who was chased to his death by police, goes missing after its unveiling.

title: Wimbledon 2022: All England Club not prepared to 'benefit Russian propaganda'
description: Wimbledon is unlikely to waver on its decision to ban Russian and Belarusian players from this year's event, despite criticism from tennis governing bodies.

title: Harlow sausage factory fire captured on video
description: Pictures show thick plumes of smoke and flames rising from the building in Harlow, Essex.

title: Angela Rayner row: Does Parliament have a problem with misogyny?
description: Claims about Angela Rayner have been dismissed as sexist, but is it a sign of a wider problem in Westminster?

title: Harry Billinge: Hundreds at funeral of D-Day veteran
description: Crowds of well-wishers pay tribute to Harry Billinge as his funeral cortege passes through St Austell.

title: DJ Tim Westwood accused of sexual misconduct
description: A joint investigation by the BBC and the Guardian has uncovered allegations of unwanted sexual behaviour and touching.

title: Call for extra bank holiday to be made permanent
description: Dragons' Den star Deborah Meaden is among business leaders who signed an open letter to ministers.

title: Antonio Rudiger: Real Madrid agree deal for Chelsea defender
description: Real Madrid have agreed a deal to sign Chelsea defender Antonio Rudiger when his contract expires at the end of the season, says Guillem Balague.

title: Ukraine war: Ukraine can hit Russia with UK weapons - minister
description: James Heappey says it is acceptable for Western weapons to be used to disrupt Russian supply lines.

title: Formula 1: Have the new rules worked?
description: Have Formula 1's new rules worked so far this year? McLaren driver Lando Norris certainly thinks so.

title: Alec Baldwin: Rust film set shooting aftermath footage released
description: Authorities also published crime scene photos after cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was fatally shot.

title: Relax law to ease HRT shortage, pharmacists say
description: Women are facing unacceptable delays accessing menopause treatments, the Royal Pharmaceutical Society says.

title: Talk TV: Piers Morgan attracts mixed reviews after network launch
description: Some said the network got off to an "impressive start," but others said it was "mind-numbingly boring".

title: Angela Rayner: I was crestfallen after Basic Instinct claim about distracting PM
description: Labour deputy leader says she was overwhelmed by support after the reports in a Sunday newspaper.

title: Shoppers could face £271 rise in annual food bills
description: Customers are turning to discount retailers as food prices continue to rise, research suggests.

title: Brazil Carnival: 'Bolsonaro' dancer turned into crocodile
description: Brazil's famous Carnival returned this year for the first time since the Covid pandemic.

title: Emma Raducanu splits from coach Torben Beltz after five months
description: Emma Raducanu has split from coach Torben Beltz after only five months.

title: Musk buys Twitter: What's changing?
description: Questions have been raised over how the platform will change after being bought by the Tesla boss.

title: NI election 2022: Sinn Féin steers clear of Irish unity focus in campaign
description: With the polls encouraging for Sinn Féin, the party is aiming for a historic result in May's election.

title: How a Japanese boat trip ended in tragedy
